levels.description: When activated, attacks only blocked enemies. Attack interval <@ba.vup>reduces very slightly</>, and creates a pool of water in attack range, which causes ground enemies to have <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed and take <@ba.vup>{damage_value}</> Arts damage per second.
